phrases: It sure feels like autumn arrived as soon as Samhain Day was over.
Now that Samhain night has passed, it suddenly feels like autumn.
Today's the start of a new semester, and I heard we are getting a new professor.
I bet she is no younger than a century old.
Most of the time, I can huff and puff all I want, but the Shiny Rod will not as much as make a peep.
Normally, the Shiny Rod will not listen to you even if you huff or puff.
But at really critical junctures, my feelings get through to it.
You cannot usually get into it because of the strong barrier though.
Due to their abandonment of work, all of the cooking, laundry, and cleaning has been halted!
This is the energy our school requires from the Sorcerer's Stone each day.
And this is the maximum daily capacity of the Sorcerer's Stone.
There is virtually no wiggle room to speak of.
There is essentially no excess to speak of.
They are cutting off the flow of magic from the Sorcerer's Stone using magic isolators!
Oh yes, Croix was scheduled to arrive today to fill a new teacher position.
There should not be any available magic.
Everyone, allow me to introduce you to the new teacher of modern magic, Professor Croix.
There we will contemplate the future of magic!
It is a sign of the apocalypse.
You are forbidden to use items such as these during lessons.
Also, I heard that you brought some sort of personal new-fangled machinery into the New Moon Tower.
Please do not put any more troubles on our plate, Professor Croix.
There is no hot water, so everyone is out of energy from not being able to shower.
All right, now listen very closely to me!
Okay you all, listen very closely to me!
We must somehow pacify them until Professor Ursula returns.
but ended up getting convinced by them in return.
The bourgeois could never understand the feelings of laborers!
She lives in a huge and luxurious room all by herself.
And here I had revised my opinion of you after the Samhain Festival.
Unfortunately it appears that was a mistake.
You have no idea how hard the people of the lower classes you are working!
You have no idea how hard the people under you are working!
There are other things that more urgently require your attention.
It is not like I want that to happen...
But the faeries say they cannot even live without the Sorcerer's Stone.
They need it a lot more than we do, but they are holding back.
The witches use ninety percent of its energy.
Ninety percent of its energy is used by witches.
But I do not want to burden anyone just for that because.
But I would not want to burden anyone because of me.
It just would not be fair to live that dream at the expense of others...
It is just not fair if someone is forced to sit and endure that...
This was made from wart of frog and eye of bat.
I call to order a negotiation with the labor union!
I ended up as their General Secretary.
We demand a ten percent increase in our alloted energy!
In addition, we request a reserve energy allowance for health and living requirements
Unfortunately, energy is not something you can create from nothing.
The Sorcerer's Stone absorbs magic from leylines before emitting it out.
Throughout the day it continuously refines raw magic and wastefully discharges the precious resource.
That is the Sorcery Solution System!
So it truly can use magic even without a Sorcerer's Stone, cannot it?
It really can use magic even without a Sorcerer's Stone.
Akko has revived three of the long-lost Words of Arcturus.
There are seven Words of Arcturus in total.
The time to reveal everything to Akko has come at last.
Release the shutter on this scene like it is the moment of a lifetime
One scene shattaa kiru you ni setsuna wo utsushite

watashitachi wa dare datte hiiro ni nareru

kanousei wo himeta sonzai, sou deshou?

kono sekai wo, jibun no yume wo

osaekirenai shoudou wa hajimari no aizu datte sa

Oh I do not want to miss a thing
It sure feels like autumn arrived as soon as Samhain Day passed.
The new semester starts today, and I heard we are getting a new professor.
I bet she is at least a hundred years old.
But man, never thought I would see Akko steal the show like that.
Got To admit you impressed me!
Let Me see that magic again, Akko.
Come on, it is not like you will run out.
It is not so easy that I can do it whenever I want.
I am finally starting to understand.
Most of the time, I can huff and puff all I want, but the Shiny Rod will not so much as make a peep.
But whenever push really comes to shove, my feelings get through to it.
It used to be Chariot's staff, right?
Akko found it in Arcturus Forest.
Is not that that forbidden forest?!
It has a really strong barrier, so you normally cannot enter it.
Rumors say it is hiding some huge secret.
And that legend's been going around for a long time.
Why did Chariot disappear, and how are Arcturus Forest and the Shiny Rod related?
I feel like it will all make sense once I find Chariot.
What did you want to talk about?
I was thinking of telling you something very important.
Please come as quickly as possible!
What is all this fuss about?
Do not think your actions will be without consequence!
My word, faeries forming a labor union is entirely unprecedented!
Their work stoppage means that all of the cooking, laundry, and cleaning has been suspended!
It appears they wish to use more energy from the Sorcerer's Stone.
Oh my, what a textbook downward trend.
This is the amount of energy our school draws from the Sorcerer's Stone each day.
And this is the Sorcerer's Stone's maximum energy output per diem.
There is virtually no excess to speak of.
But without the faeries doing their work, the school will be unable to function.
Are not some of our graduates using Sorcerer's Stones for farming and a shoe factory and such?
Why not ask them to share some energy?
If we request a little at a time, would not that leave us with enough to satisfy the faeries for now?
We all have the same issue; nobody has any leftover energy.
We will try every witch we can find!
We aged witches could not possibly...
I do not have the time for this...
Then Professor Ursula is not here?
Yeah, she said she will be back in two or three days.
We are stuck with this until she returns.
There is not much else we can do because of the strike.
I used flavor magic to make it so disgusting your eyes would pop out of your head.
Stop what you are doing, fairies!
They are putting up magic isolators to cut off the flow of magic from the Sorcerer's Stone!
Oh yes, Croix was scheduled to arrive today to fill the new teacher position.
Headmistress, it is been far too long.
You certainly came right in the middle of trouble.
There should not be any magic available to it.
This is a sorcery unit created by utilizing magitronics.
Basically, you could call it an evolved broom.
Everyone, allow me to introduce to you the new teacher of modern magic, Professor Croix.
Please come to my classroom if I piqued your interest.
We will contemplate the future of magic there!
Are they going to clean up the entire sky next?!
The strike is not over yet.
But anyway, Professor Croix sure was cool.
I wonder what you learn in modern magic.
I heard from some of the girls who took it that they use tablets Professor Croix developed.
This is a precursor to the impending apocalypse.
You are forbidden to use items such as those during lessons.
Also, I heard that you placed some sort of new-fangled machinery for personal use inside the New Moon Tower.
Are you referring to my research tools?
Please do not add to the troubles already on our plate, Professor Croix.
It sucks that the heating's out.
Hey, hey, what is going on?!
Since there is no hot water, not being able to shower has sapped everyone of their energy.
If we cannot use magic, what will happen to our classes?
all lesson plans have been altered to memorizing spells!
I will go talk to them!
They need to stop striking right away!
Clean those ears and listen very closely to me!
We must somehow mollify them until Professor Ursula returns.
Hello, it must be rough out here in the cold weather.
You are to disband this instant!
We demand an increased share of energy as our salary!
She tried to convince them to end their strike,
but ended up getting convinced by them instead.
Let us use the Sorcerer's Stone!
I ask of youwhat will you do if we lose Luna Nova?
Allowing witches to use the Sorcerer's Stone is necessary for the academy's continued existence.
Do you not all wish to continue working here?
Without your jobs, you will have no place left to live.
Are you willing to accept that?
Now, call off your strike this instant!
The bourgeoisie is blind to the concerns of the working class!
She has a huge and luxurious room all to herself.
That is right, she is an aristocrat!
To think I had revised my opinion of you after the Samhain Festival.
Unfortunately, I seem to have been mistaken.
You are always looking down on others!
You have no idea how hard the people of the lower classes are working!
This is a waste of time.
There are other things that require your attention more urgently.
We will never be able to use magic again at this rate.
Are you fine with that, Akko?
It is not like I want that, either...
But the faeries say they cannot even live without the Sorcerer's Stone.
Right, they could not even move back when the dragon stole it before.
They need it a lot more than we do, but they are making do with what little they have.
We witches use ninety percent of its energy.
It is only natural that witches would need to use magic.
You know how I want to become a witch like Chariot and use amazing magic to make people happy, right?
But I do not want to trouble anyone just for that because.
It just would not be fair if someone else had to bear my burden...
You have only got yourself to blame for trying to think so hard.
You are actually giving this proper thought.
We made some soup, so please help yourselves.
This was made from frog warts and bat eyes.
I call to order the negotiation with the labor union!
I ended up becoming their General Secretary.
My, you are really climbing the ranks!
We demand a ten-percent increase of our energy allotment!
In addition, we request a separate energy allowance for health and living requirements
Unfortunately, energy is not something you can create.
Using the Sorcery Solution System I am developing, SSS for short,
Magic is weakening by the year!
Whatever shall we do if magic ever runs out completely?
If you install this SSS, you can say goodbye to such outdated worries!
The Sorcerer's Stone absorbs magic from leylines before emitting it again.
Throughout the day, it continuously refines raw magic and wastefully discharges the precious resource.
But we can convert the previously wasted energy into another form for storage, maintenance, and efficient use!
That is the Sorcery Solution System!
Assuage your fears, for magic can be used exactly as it has been.
You will be able to ride brooms and perform summonings as you wish.
As proof, this sorcery unit is flying by the power of an SSS.
True, it does require a research expenditure.
But if we create a research lab at Luna Nova, we will be eligible for a government subsidy.
Therefore the net cost is zero!
It automatically collects energy from the Sorcerer's Stone while the witches are sleeping.
The energy is then converted into a semipermanent form.
That would allow the witches and faeries to fairly and equally use the energy.
We approve of the Sorcerer Whatchamacallit!
We witches have a duty to uphold the traditions of Luna Nova passed down by our predecessors.
Professor Croix, at the risk of sounding like a broken record,
please refrain from bringing modern machinery to our school.
It takes courage to accept the new and unfamiliar.
Thank you for saving me when you got here.
Come visit me during my next modern magic lesson.
We will keep it a secret, so let us take just one shower!
Look, we even brought your favorite thing.
Will you let us take a shower?
W-We understand, we will accept your demands!
We have to release the magic!
I cannot tell what he is thinking at all.
Breathe life once more into the injured faerie!
Looks like he is in good spirits again.
It really saved the day, Headmistress.
So it truly can use magic even without a Sorcerer's Stone, can it?
Do not forget about the subsidy!
Where did the faeries even get something like this?
In any case, the issues have been resolved.
The academy reconciled with the labor union on the condition of installing the Sorcery Solution System.
In addition, a research lab was created in the New Moon Tower to support it,
and the restriction on digital devices has been lifted.
Thus marks the dawn of a new era for Luna Nova.
No way, I cannot believe this!
Anyway, is not Professor Croix just the coolest?
But we do not actually need those anymore.
The fuss has died down, so now I can have a nice, long chat with Akko.
It really is convenient, is not it?
Even though I just learned another spell
Even though I just learned another spell
The things I want to do are still out of reach
The things I want to do are still out of reach
My skills are no match for my fantasies
imeeji suru no wa i am about to yori takaku
My skills are no match for my fantasies
imeeji suru no wa i am about to yori takaku
Yet my heart leaps out to meet them
Yet my heart leaps out to meet them
Breaking my tiny she will one layer at a time
Breaking my tiny she will one layer at a time
I will not let my reckless abandon go to waste
I will not let my reckless abandon go to waste
I will leave who I was yesterday behind
kinou no watashi wo koeru you ni
I will leave who I was yesterday behind
kinou no watashi wo koeru you ni
Unfurling my transparent wings to the sky
Unfurling my transparent wings to the sky
I feel I can get closer to the tomorrow of my ideals
akogareteta ashita e kitto chikadzukeru ki ga shiterunda
I feel I can get closer to the tomorrow of my ideals
akogareteta ashita e kitto chikadzukeru ki ga shiterunda
Putting together the shards of a starry sky that I found
Putting together the shards of a starry sky that I found
I will keep on chasing my dream to learn even more
motto shiritai yume wo ou yo
